## LeagueManager.fetch() method

Fetch a summoner's competitive info by the summoner's ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(id: string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Collection<QueueType, LeagueEntry>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID of the summoner whose competitive info you want to find. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Collection&lt;[QueueType](./shieldbow.queuetype.md)<!-- -->, [LeagueEntry](./shieldbow.leagueentry.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
